title: What is a variable?
questions: A named piece of memory that holds a value which can be changed as a program is running
A value that usually changes as a program is running
A named piece of memory that holds a value which cannot be changed as a program is running

title: What is a constant?
questions: A value that does not usually change as a program is running
A named piece of memory that holds a value which cannot be changed as a program is running
A named piece of memory that holds a value which usually changes as a program is running

title: Giving a variable a value is known as what?
questions: Equivalence
Assignment
Declaration

title: Which data type represents whole numbers?
questions: Real
String
Integer

title: What is casting?
questions: Naming a variable
Giving a value to a variable
Changing the data type of a variabl

title: What is the name given to the joining of strings?
questions: Manipulation
Concatenation
Concatenation

title: What is an array?
questions: A data structure that holds one or more items of data
A variable with more than one value
A variable with more than one data type

title: Which logical operator represents greater than?
Which are the Boolean operators?
questions: <, > and =
TRUE and FALSE
AND, OR and NOT

title: Which of the following is a benefit of using local variables?
questions: Other programmers cannot use them
They cannot accidentally be changed by other parts of a program
They make all variable names unique

title: What is a substring?
questions: A smaller string extracted from a main string
A small string generated by a program
A built-in function to extract a smaller string from a large string

title: What is the purpose of validation?
questions: To ensure that data entered is sensible and possible
To ensure that data entered is correct
To ensure that the programmer has met all requirements

title: What is a subroutine?
questions: A piece of code written in a separate module (file)
A piece of code that is smaller than the main program
A named piece of code written outside of the main program

title: What is a function?
questions: A type of subroutine that calculates a value
A type of subroutine that returns a value
A type of subroutine that processes a value, but does not return it

title: Which of the following are validation techniques?
questions: Presence check, length check, verification check
Presence check, format check, range check
Presence check, range check, verification check

title: What are two types of programming error?
questions: Syntax errors and logic errors
Syntax errors and validation errors
Logic errors and validation errors

title: What is the purpose of testing?
questions: To ensure that a user becomes familiar with a program
To ensure that a program functions as intended
To ensure that the programmer has met all requirements

title: What are the three types of test data?
questions: Valid, invalid and erroneous
Normal, erroneous and boundary
Erroneous, extreme and invalid

title: What is recorded in a test table?
questions: Evidence of successful tests
Evidence of failed tests
Evidence of testing

title: What is a byte?
questions: 4 bits
8 bits
1,000 bits
